entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
